item.title: Nick Cave’s Piercing Exploration of Grief
item.author: Cara Burke,
item.description: 4.5 stars Hunched among a small crowd in Rough Trade East, bags on our laps and posters bundled awkwardly around us, we heard Nick Cave and the Bad Seed’s Ghosteen for the first time. It was the album’s premiere and I was at an album playback party only a week after its release had been casually …
